text:
In their first red carpet appearance since bringing their baby, Jack, into the world, engaged couple Rosie Huntington-Whiteley and Jason Statham headed out to the premiere of The Meg last night.

The actor wore a blue suit to the Hollywood event, whilst model and business woman Huntington-Whitely looked gorgeous in Stella McCartney’s Cady Gown.



Last night before the screening, the 31 year-old shared three close-up snaps of her glowing make-up, captioning one of the pictures, ‘Fiancé’s Hollywood movie premiere glam.’



The new mother then went on to share three rare pictures of her little family.

Captioning the black and white portraits, 'Fam ❤️’and, ‘Dads movie premiere. So proud of you j. ❤️’

In the pictures, the mother and father pose as their one year-old embraces them.

The British couple are particularly private about their young child, and choose not to show his face in pictures.

The model, who recently founded Rose Inc, told Harper's Bazaarof her move into motherhood, 'It sounds so clichéd, but it’s just been the most magical experience. Everything feels so special and sweet and wholesome and loving and then at the same time it's been... life-changing, and my focus is now this person; this is what I want to do,' she said.

'This is what I want to pour my heart into now.'
title: Rosie Huntington-Whiteley Just Shared Very Rare And Adorable Pictures Of Her Little Family
